enter-account-info: Enter your information to create an account

faq.q1: What is meant by royalty-free rights?
faq.a1: It means you can use the content without paying recurring fees.
faq.q2: Can I access the course after my subscription ends?
faq.a2: Yes, if you purchased it, it remains yours for life.
faq.q3: Are there certificates after completing the course?
faq.a3: Yes, you receive a completion certificate after finishing the course.
faq.a4: Yes, you can download them and watch offline.
faq.q5: Are the courses up to date?
faq.a5: Yes, the content is updated regularly.
faq.a6: Yes, we have a support team available 24/7.
faq.a7: We accept card payments, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
faq.a8: Yes, there is a 30-day money-back guarantee.

headline: Headline
edit-account: Edit your account settings and change your password here
avatar: Add a picture to your profile
change-email-desc: .Please enter the new email address and your current password
show-profile-label: Show my profile to registered users
show-reviews-label: Allow users to view my course reviews
mange-notification: Managing the types of communications you receive
prefs-note: Note: It may take a few hours for changes to appear in your preferences. You will continue to receive transactional emails regarding your account and subscriptions if you unsubscribe.
warning-close: Warning: If you close your account, you will be canceled from all 266 of your courses and will lose access to your account and associated data permanently, even if you choose to create a new account using the same email address in the future.
delete-alert: Are you sure you want to delete the account?
delete-data: Your account will be permanently deleted and this action cannot be reversed. All your data will be lost and you will not be able to recover it later.
